title: Horst - Sixty Years of Photography (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
279 pages / pdf / 27.8 MB / English / 1996

The book contains over 200 duotone & colour images covering Horst.P.Horst's photographic career.
Nicely reproduced photographs of some of the Vogue covers as well as portrait's of people like Coco Channel. The photographs show Horst's lighting technique wonderfully.
This book is ideal for any photographer who really wants to use light well.

A beautiful look at Horst's work - a contemporary of Avedon and Penn at Vogue. His Mainbocher Corset shot remains classic and iconographic. His use of directional spotlight to create shadow is beautiful to behold.
